text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews This is what's important to you? Nobody is reporting this "major feat" because it doesn't matter to any American.  A major feat would have been preventing 100K+ deaths by recognizing the danger of the coronavirus and responding early and appropriately instead of calling it a flu.
